keyword: how many calories in a whopper with cheese
title: How Many Calories in a Whopper with Cheese?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a whopper with cheese, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, fat, carbs, and easy tweaks for your meal.
h1: How Many Calories in a Whopper with Cheese?
assumptions: Standard Burger King Whopper with cheese: flame-grilled beef patty, American cheese, sesame bun, lettuce, tomatoes, pickles, onions, mayo, ketchup; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, customizations, and preparation; values based on official averages. Check Burger King app or packaging for exacts.

quick_answer.text: A Whopper with cheese has about 740 calories and 35g of protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a plain Whopper with cheese?
faqs.a: About 740 kcal for the standard version with toppings.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a Whopper with cheese?
faqs.a: Approximately 35 g of protein per burger.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Whopper with cheese?
faqs.a: Around 1260 mg, mostly from condiments and bun.

faqs.q: Does a Whopper with cheese have trans fats?
faqs.a: Yes, about 1 g from the beef patty.

faqs.q: How do customizations affect calories in a Whopper with cheese?
faqs.a: Removing bun saves ~200 kcal; adding extras like bacon adds ~100 kcal.
